Translations.Text: Sano Firiauna jwatite: “Ikaninajo kukwangu nsaŵi jwalijose jwakumanyilila chenene (usaŵi).”
Basi ndema jaŵaikangene asaŵi, Musa jwaatesile kuti: “Ponyani yankusaka kuponya.”
Basi ndema jaŵaponyisye, Musa jwatite: “Yam’biche nayoyitu uŵele usaŵi, chisimu Allah chauwesesye sampano. Chisimu Allah jwangakolosya masengo gaakuwatanganya.”
“Soni Allah chailimbikasye yakuona ni maloŵe Gakwe, namuno akuleŵa yachime.”

Nambo pangali ŵaŵankulupilile Musa niikaŵeje achachanda ŵa mu ŵandu ŵakwe pakun’jogopa Firiauna ni nduna syao kuti ata kwalagasya. Soni chisimu Firiauna jwaliji jwakulikwesya pa chilambo, soni chisimu jwalakwe jwaliji mu akupunda malile pa konanga
Sano Musa jwatite: “E ŵandu ŵangu! Nam’baga jenumanja munkulupilile Allah, basi Kukwakwe pe jegamilani nam’baga jenumanja Asilamu (ŵakulipeleka kwa Allah).”
Basi ŵanganyao ŵatite: “Tujegamiile kwa Allah. E Ambuje ŵetu! Ngasintutenda uwwe kuŵa akulagasyidwa ni ŵandu ŵalupuso.”
“Soni tujokolani ni chanasa Chenu ku ŵandu achimakafili.”

Ni twan’juwulile Musa ni nkulugwe (Haruna) yanti: “Mwakolochesyani ŵandu ŵenu m’Misra majumba, nin’gatende majumba genugo kuŵa mwakuswalila (pakuti nganim’ba nkombwele kuswalila m’misikiti), soni jimikani Swala mwakolosya, ni mwape abali jakusengwasya ŵakulupilila.”

Sano Musa jwatite: “Ambuje ŵetu! Chisimu Mmwe mumpele Firiauna ni nduna syakwe ipeto ni ipanje pa umi wa duniya, Ambuje ŵetu! (Ŵanganyao akuikamulisya masengo yalakweyo) kuti asochelesye kwitala Lyenu. Ambuje ŵetu! Ijonangani ipanje yao, ni n’jijumusye mitima jao mwanti akakulupilila mpaka ayione ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope.”
